attributes.action: Save Rhiwgarn Infant school from closure!!!!
attributes.additional_details:
As many of you are aware there is a proposal to close Rhiwgarn Infant school in Trebanog.
The school has stood at the heart of the community for 50 years providing education and support for the children in our area.
We cannot allow this proposal to go ahead!!!
We owe it to the families & children of our community to all join together and fight to save our school!!!!
Please sign & then share this petition with friends, family & community members..
Thank you :-)
